entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (itp_veers_main.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_16: A Rebel officer claims to have information for us. Go to Dantooine and investigate. Proceed with care.
entries.s_20: A Rebel officer claims to have information for us. Go to Dantooine and investigate.
entries.s_25: Proceed with care. I do not know what you should expect.
entries.s_28: So it was a trap? I should have known. But thanks to you, that Rebel will no longer be a threat. I have even better news. You have been given the honor of an audience with the Emperor. I suggest you don't keep him waiting.
entries.s_32: Infiltrate a Rebel base on Talus for information about the Rebel destruction of the Death Star.
entries.s_34: I have a mission for you. Infiltrate a Rebel base on Talus for information about the Rebel destruction of the Death Star.
entries.s_39: The Rebels will pay for the loss of so many Imperial lives.
entries.s_43: I'm afraid I only have orders I have are for those on active duty.
entries.s_44: The function of this base is not of your concern. I would suggest you make yourself scarce.
entries.s_46: I do not have any orders for you, trooper. Try elsewhere in the Captain Thrawn.
entries.s_47: It was a trap, and you were caught in it. I would dearly like to make that Rebel officer pay. Maybe they will try the same ploy again if we set it up. Willing to try again?
entries.s_51: Good. You know what to do. I expect better results this time.
